pullrequest.title: Allow rendering of models in wireframe.

content.raw:
MainWindow_TEST is failing for me:
~~~
Prerender
FAIL!  : MainWindow_TEST::Wireframe() 'fabs(avgPreWireframe - avgPostWireframe) > 10' returned FALSE. ()
   Loc: [/home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo/gazebo/gui/MainWindow_TEST.cc(123)]
ResPercentChange[2.73948]
FAIL!  : MainWindow_TEST::Wireframe() 'sharePercentChange < this->shareMaxPercentChange' returned FALSE. ()
   Loc: [/home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo/gazebo/gui/QTestFixture.cc(141)]
PASS   : MainWindow_TEST::cleanupTestCase()
Totals: 2 passed, 2 failed, 0 skipped
********* Finished testing of MainWindow_TEST *********

Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
[Switching to Thread 0x7fffb97fa700 (LWP 29782)]
0x00007fff9c9579e0 in ?? ()
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007fff9c9579e0 in ?? ()
#1  0x00007ffff70b0dc6 in gazebo::sensors::SensorManager::Update (
    this=0x7ffff761e3a0, _force=false)
    at /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo/gazebo/sensors/SensorManager.cc:156
#2  0x00007ffff64ece4f in gazebo::Server::Run (this=0x7fff9c0008e0)
    at /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo/gazebo/Server.cc:416
#3  0x0000000000417a49 in QTestFixture::RunServer (this=0x7fffffffdc50, 
    _worldFilename=..., _paused=false, _createScene=false)
    at /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo/gazebo/gui/QTestFixture.cc:108
#4  0x00007ffff49e6ce9 in thread_proxy ()
   from /usr/lib/libboost_thread.so.1.46.1
#5  0x00007ffff62afe9a in start_thread (arg=0x7fffb97fa700)
    at pthread_create.c:308
#6  0x00007ffff3ff4cbd in clone ()
    at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/x86_64/clone.S:112
#7  0x0000000000000000 in ?? ()
(gdb) 
~~~
I just put a gazebo-any job in the queue, so we'll see how it does (the following link won't work until the job starts): http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-precise-amd64-gpu-vrc/19
